text: introducing Amazon Nova Premiere our
most advanced most capable multimodal
model yet beyond simple question
answering or text generation it's
designed from the ground up to take on
intricate multi-step workflows amazon
Nova Premiere is our most capable model
for complex tasks like software
development multi-step function calling
and powering agentic workflows let's
look at an example say you're a
financial analyst trying to research
current market trends traditionally
finding answers could take hours if not
days and would require manually
synthesizing dozens of data sources just
to get clarity by building an AI
assistant powered by Amazon Nova
Premiere you could ask advanced
questions about the markets and get
meaningful
responses we build a supervisor agent
using Amazon Nova Premiere the
supervisor breaks down complex tasks and
coordinates the sub aents which are also
powered by Nova Premiere to address
these tasks the sub aents then pull data
from sources chosen by the financial
analyst which the supervising agent
distills down into a manageable report
all of this is built and orchestrated
using Amazon Bedrock agents and multi-
aent collaboration amazon Nova Premiere
is also our most capable teacher model
and can be used with Amazon Bedrock
model distillation to create custom
distilled models for specific customer
needs you can select Amazon Nova
Premiere as the teacher model to
transfer its knowledge to fine-tune a
smaller low latency model like Nova
Micro the student model using your
invocation logs
now you can build on your student model
and get the quality of Amazon Nova
Premiere for your use case while still
benefiting from the speed of a smaller
model like Nova
[Music]
Micro experience the power of Amazon
Nova Premiere available now in Amazon
Bedrock
